notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The European Commission under the Seventh Framework Programme (FP7) of the European Union, Marie Curie International Research Staff Exchange Scheme (MC-IRSES). Project PEOPLE MC-IRSES, FP7-PEOPLE-2011-IRSES, PIRSES-GA-2011-295251 Fundação para a Ciência e Tecnologia (FCT/MCTES), FEDER, PT2020 PA, Compete 2020. Projects MED UIDB/05183/2020 and CESAM UIDP/50017/2020 + UIDB/50017/2020.
